mention.text: The welfare state , the glue that binds the social fabric of the world 's advanced capitalist economies
the glue that binds the social fabric of the world 's advanced capitalist economies
its increasing cost at a time when budget deficits burden most of the 24 member states of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
a time when budget deficits burden most of the 24 member states of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
the first in a series of articles analysing the pressures on the welfare state across the world , and examining policy options for relieving the strain

The biggest element in this growth
the cost of pensions , healthcare , unemployment benefits and family support

pensions , where costs will in any case rise

pension schemes introduced after the second world war
